thread.title: Consistent quality from Premier Inn -
thread.title_full: Consistent quality from Premier Inn - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ruth M
title: Consistent quality from Premier Inn -
text:
Apart from the room being very hot with 4 people in it (and the air con being quite weak - but it was qquiet enough outside to have the window open all night), the room was fine. No issue at all with anything.
Staff all fab, friendly and polite. Breakfast was excellent. Better than all previous Premier Inn stays actually.
